description: Demonstrates the capacity to engage with stakeholders both internally and externally, and to develop strong interpersonal relationships with teams and clients to unlock their potential
Helps people develop their own independent thinking, guiding them through processes and facilitating learning
Comprehends the ability to lead people through processes towards agreed-upon objectives in a manner that encourages participation, ownership, and creativity
Comprehends the ability to energize people to achieve their goals
Delivers well-scoped programs of work that meet their goals, on time, to budget, harmoniously
Focuses on teamwork, communication skills, asking for and giving feedback, collaboration, and documentation
Is focused on delivering repeatable value to our clients by ensuring excellent quality products and services internally and/or externally
Challenges the status quo and takes ownership and initiative outside of mandated work
Strengthens Palantir's values to create and collaborate in open, diverse, and inclusive environments
Is able to deal with volatility, uncertainty, ambiguity, and an increasing rate of change in the Complex domain when the outcome is emergent
Provides strategic support to individuals to help them build the careers they want
Provides support to others, spreads knowledge, and develops the team outside formal reporting structures
Impacts and promotes Palantir's culture and values positively through leadership and representation of our brand
